taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species curtipes;

treatment.description: Very similar to no. 51; axis of flowering shoot and short pedicels (1-2 cm. long) prickleless or with only 1 or 2 setae and usually glandless (or “sometimes ... one or two indifferent glands ... A well-marked species”).
treatment.discussion: Perhaps eventually to be merged with no. 51.
